channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: hi, i just found out about moparscape and i want to join/create a server, I've seen theres a guide for MoparScape 3.1 but it doesnt help me. i want to know if any1 could help me :D

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Duhsmersh Duhsmersh
item.description:
@Duhsmersh wrote:

don’t make stupid polls it spam, and to join go on the downloads section and download moparscape 3.2 (at the top of the screen) after you download it, load it up, then find a server on sever advertizement, then put the ip you find (Ex. milkscape.no-ip.org (not a real server to my knowlage)) in the ip section of the login screen then make up a name and pass and login.

Read full topic
